LanguageData.CultivatorTools_AdjustDirection_Desc: Click to rotate clockwise. Current direction is: {0}
LanguageData.CultivatorTools_SeedsPleaseActiveDesc: NOTE: Because you are using SeedsPlease, the cultivator will search for seeds in its radius to plant.
LanguageData.CultivatorTools_SeedsPleaseInactiveDesc: The mod SeedsPlease has not been detected. This device does not require seeds.
